RESOURCE.NAME: Annotation Schema
RESOURCE.COMMENT: An annotation type and its features.

PARAMETER.NAME: xmlFileUrl
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The url to the definition file

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: longestMatchOnly
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this gazetteer only match the longest string starting from any offset?

PARAMETER.NAME: wholeWordsOnly
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this gazetteer only match whole words?

PARAMETER.NAME: bootstrapGazetteer
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The DefaultGazetteer that is to be used to bootstrap this shared instance

RESOURCE.NAME: Hash Gazetteer
RESOURCE.COMMENT: A list lookup component implemented by OntoText Lab. The licence information is also available in licence.ontotext.html in the lib folder of GATE

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: listsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the file with list of lists
The encoding used for reading the definitions
PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
caseSensitive
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this gazetteer diferentiate on case? Currently the Gazetteer works only in case sensitive mode.
The document to be processed
PARAMETER.NAME: document
inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used as input that must contain 'Token' annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used as output for 'Sentence' and 'Split' annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the definition files

PARAMETER.NAME: gazetteerListsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the custom list lookup definition file

PARAMETER.NAME: transducerURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the custom Jape grammar file

RESOURCE.NAME: RegEx Sentence Splitter
RESOURCE.COMMENT: A sentence splitter based on regular expressions.

PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed
PARAMETER.NAME: document
outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used as output for 'Sentence' and 'Split' annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the definition files

PARAMETER.NAME: internalSplitListURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the internal splits pattern list

PARAMETER.NAME: externalSplitListURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the external splits pattern list

PARAMETER.NAME: nonSplitListURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the non splits pattern list

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used as input that must contain 'Token' and 'Sentence' annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used as output for POS annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading rules and lexicons

PARAMETER.NAME: lexiconURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the lexicon file

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the ruleset file

PARAMETER.NAME: baseTokenAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the base 'Token' annotation type

PARAMETER.NAME: baseSentenceAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the base 'Sentence' annotation type

PARAMETER.NAME: outputAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the annotation type where the new features should be added
The URL to the definition file
PARAMETER.NAME: definitionFileURL

PARAMETER.COMMENT: Minimum likelihood that a name is a nickname
PARAMETER.NAME: minimumNicknameLikelihood
highPrecisionOrgs
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Use very safe features for matching orgs, such as ACME = ACME, Inc.
The encoding used for reading the definition file
PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation set name where are the annotation types (annotationTypes)

PARAMETER.NAME: caseSensitive
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this resource diferentiate on case?

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Name of the annotation types to use

PARAMETER.NAME: processUnknown
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should we process 'Unknown' annotations?

PARAMETER.NAME: organizationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation name for the organizations

PARAMETER.NAME: personType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Annotation name for the persons

PARAMETER.NAME: extLists
PARAMETER.COMMENT: External lists otherwise internal

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: inanimatedEntityTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: List of annotation types for non animated entities

PARAMETER.NAME: resolveIt
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Whether or not to resolve it pronouns

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationTypes
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation types to delete otherwise delete all

PARAMETER.NAME: setsToKeep
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation sets to keep otherwise delete all

PARAMETER.NAME: keepOriginalMarkupsAS
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should we keep the 'Original markups' annotation set?
